thread.title: Candy Crush Soda Saga Arrives on Windows Phone, Sort Of
thread.title_full: Candy Crush Soda Saga Arrives on Windows Phone, Sort Of - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Candy Crush Soda Saga Arrives on Windows Phone, Sort Of
text: If you finally got bored of playing Candy Crush Saga (is that even possible?) and you're using a Windows Phone for your gameplay session, it looks like King has you covered with another addictive title in the same franchise, Candy Crush Soda Saga. The 3-match puzzle has been around on Android and iOS devices for quite some time now, but developers only launched iton Windows Phone today. In fact, the game has been released for Windows 10 devices, including handsets that r... Â»
